MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL45 and LL44 postcode area of Llanbedr and Dyffryn Ardudwy. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Our emergency response team are on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible and our team are now working to get the power back on by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:58PM on 30th March 2021
